title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create a user authentication UI with conditional rendering:

1. Create an `AuthApp` object with:
   - state: { isLoggedIn: false, user: null, loading: false }
   - login(username) method
   - logout() method
   - render() method that shows different UI based on state

2. Show:
   - Loading message when loading = true
   - Login button when not logged in
   - Welcome message + Logout button when logged in

3. Test all states
